rooms.description: A welcoming entrance hall with direct access to the living and kitchen area.
An open-plan space combined with a modern Chettinad style decor including traditional wood carvings and stone accents.
A fully equipped open kitchen integrated into the living area, designed to promote family interaction and adherence to Vastu principles for positive energy flow.
Adjacent space for dining that can be easily separated from the main living area using traditional screens.
A comfortable guest bedroom with natural light and decor inspired by Chettinad aesthetics.

openings.description: A traditional wooden door enhanced with modern security features.
Provides access to a small balcony space for ventilation and natural light.
Strategically placed windows ensuring adequate daylight and airflow while following Vastu principles.

rooms.description: Spacious master bedroom with an attached walk-in closet and en-suite bathroom. Designed to enhance privacy and ensure a peaceful environment.
A secondary bedroom designed for additional family space or office use.
Modern bathroom with contemporary fixtures that complement the overall Chettinad style.
A dedicated area for work or study, equipped with ample natural light and inspired by regional design elements.

openings.location: north side of the floor plan
openings.description: A secure and aesthetically pleasing staircase connecting the ground and first floors.
Additional windows ensuring proper ventilation in line with Vastu principles.
